title: PBE Rp and bp
body: So I just got a PBE account, and while it was downloading the game, i had 999900 (something like that) and 999k bp. I logged in today and i had 5 bp and 3000 rp. Is this a bug, or is this normal?

replies.body: PBE accounts don't start with that ungodly amount of RP/BE anymore. Be sure to read up on the changes to those stipends over on the [**PBE boards**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence).

Same happened to me.. it might be a bug yes
but it can also be a new change they are making
maybe they will make it only 3k RP and 5 BE but inf, i don't know i'm just guessing!
but i'm pretty sure they saw the other threads about this problem and they're working on a fix ^^.
Has happened to myself and a friend.
So it must be a bug?
